name: Black Holes for Dummies
description:
Have you ever dreamed of being in the shoes of a brilliant scientist? Well, today is your lucky day!

You play as a scientist who has created a REAL BLACK HOLE in his laboratory! Although it is small, it grows very fast. Wait, what?.. Grows ?! This is bad!

You need to stop it! As soon as possible!

But how?

Your old invention, the Anti-Matter Converter, will help you here. I think you will understand how to use it.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Mouse - look around

E - pick up item

Left mouse button - shoot anti-material beam
